00025     template<typename Type>
00026     class Complex
00027     {
00028     public:
00030         Complex(Type real, Type imaginary)
00031         {
00032             setValue(real, imaginary);
00033         }
00034 
00036         Complex(const Complex<Type> & c)
00037         {
00038             setValue(c.m_real, c.m_imag);
00039         }
00040 
00042         virtual ~Complex(){}
00043 
00045         Complex<Type> & setValue(Type real, Type imaginary)
00046         {
00047             m_real = real;
00048             m_imag = imaginary;
00049             return *this;
00050         }
00051 
00053         const Type & getReal() const
00054         { 
00055             return m_real; 
00056         }
00057 
00059         void setReal(Type real)
00060         { 
00061             m_real = real; 
00062         }
00063 
00065         const Type & getImaginary() const
00066         { 
00067             return m_imag; 
00068         }
00069 
00071         void setImaginary(Type imaginary)
00072         { 
00073             m_imag = imaginary; 
00074         }
00075 
00077         void negate()
00078         {
00079             setValue(-m_real, -m_imag);
00080         }
00081 
00083         bool equals(const Complex<Type> & a_complex, const Type a_tolerance=1E-2) const
00084         {
00085             return ((std::abs(m_real - a_complex.m_real) <= a_tolerance) &&
00086                     (std::abs(m_imag - a_complex.m_imag) <= a_tolerance));
00087         }
00088 
00090         Type modulus() const
00091         {
00092             return (Type)std::sqrt( sqrModulus() );
00093         }
00094 
00096         Type sqrModulus() const
00097         {
00098             return (m_real * m_real + m_imag * m_imag);
00099         }
00100 
00102         Complex<Type> getConjugate() const
00103         {
00104             return Complex<Type>(m_real, -m_imag);
00105         }
00106 
00108         void normalize()
00109         {
00110             Type inv_modulus = (Type)(1.0 / modulus());
00111 
00112             m_real      = m_real * inv_modulus;
00113             m_imag      = m_imag * inv_modulus;
00114         }
00115 
00117         friend bool operator ==(const Complex<Type> & c1, const Complex<Type> & c2)
00118         { 
00119             return c1.m_real==c2.m_real && c1.m_imag==c2.m_imag; 
00120         }
00121 
00123         friend bool operator !=(const Complex<Type> & c1, const Complex<Type> & c2)
00124         { 
00125             return !(c1 == c2); 
00126         }
00127 
00129         Complex<Type> operator-() const
00130         { 
00131             return Complex<Type>(-m_real, -m_imag); 
00132         }
00133 
00134         Complex<Type> & operator *=(const Complex<Type> & c)
00135         {
00136             m_real += m_real * c.m_real - m_imag * c.m_imag;
00137             m_imag += m_real * c.m_imag + m_imag * c.m_real;
00138             return *this;
00139         }
00140 
00141         Complex<Type> & operator *=(const Type & d)
00142         {
00143             m_real *= d;
00144             m_imag *= d;
00145             return *this;
00146         }
00147 
00148         Complex<Type> & operator /=(const Complex<Type> & c)
00149         {
00150             Type inv_sqr_modulus = (Type)(1.0 / sqrModulus());
00151 
00152             m_real = ( m_real*c.m_real + m_imag*c.m_imag ) * inv_sqr_modulus;
00153             m_imag = ( m_imag*c.m_real - m_real*c.m_imag ) * inv_sqr_modulus;
00154 
00155             return *this;
00156         }
00157 
00158         Complex<Type> & operator /=(const Type & d)
00159         {
00160             m_real /= d;
00161             m_imag /= d;
00162             return *this;
00163         }
00164 
00165         Complex<Type> & operator +=(const Complex<Type> & c)
00166         {
00167             m_real += c.m_real;
00168             m_imag += c.m_imag;
00169             return *this;
00170         }
00171 
00172         Complex<Type> & operator +=(const Type & d)
00173         {
00174             m_real += d;
00175             return *this;
00176         }
00177 
00178         Complex<Type> & operator -=(const Complex<Type> & c)
00179         {
00180             m_real -= c.m_real;
00181             m_imag -= c.m_imag;
00182             return *this;
00183         }
00184 
00185         Complex<Type> & operator -=(const Type & d)
00186         {
00187             m_real -= d;
00188             return *this;
00189         }
00190 
00191         friend Complex<Type> operator *(const Complex<Type> & c1, const Complex<Type> & c2)
00192         { 
00193             return Complex<Type>(c1.m_real * c2.m_real - c1.m_imag * c2.m_imag, c1.m_real * c2.m_imag + c1.m_imag * c2.m_real);
00194         }
00195         friend Complex<Type> operator *(const Complex<Type> & c, const Type d)
00196         { 
00197             return Complex<Type>(c.m_real * d, c.m_imag * d);
00198         }
00199         friend Complex<Type> operator *(const Type d, const Complex<Type> & c)
00200         { 
00201             return c * d; 
00202         }
00203 
00204         friend Complex<Type> operator /(const Complex<Type> & c, const Type d)
00205         { 
00206             return Complex<Type>(c.m_real / d, c.m_imag / d);
00207         }
00208         friend Complex<Type> operator /(const Complex<Type> & c1, const Complex<Type> & c2)
00209         { 
00210             return Complex<Type>(c1 * c2.getConjugate() / c2.sqrModulus()); 
00211         }
00212 
00213         friend Complex<Type> operator +(const Complex<Type> & c1, const Complex<Type> & c2)
00214         { 
00215             return Complex<Type>(c1.m_real + c2.m_real,c1.m_imag + c2.m_imag);
00216         }
00217         friend Complex<Type> operator +(const Complex<Type> & c, const Type d)
00218         { 
00219             return Complex<Type>(c.m_real + d, c.m_imag);
00220         }
00221         friend Complex<Type> operator +(const Type d, const Complex<Type> & c)
00222         { 
00223             return c + d; 
00224         }
00225 
00226         friend Complex<Type> operator -(const Complex<Type> & c1, const Complex<Type> & c2)
00227         { 
00228             return Complex<Type>(c1.m_real - c2.m_real,c1.m_imag - c2.m_imag);  
00229         }
00230         friend Complex<Type> operator -(const Complex<Type> & c, const Type d)
00231         { 
00232             return Complex<Type>(c.m_real - d, c.m_imag);
00233         }
00234         friend Complex<Type> operator -(const Type d, const Complex<Type> & c)
00235         { 
00236             return c - d; 
00237         }
00238 
00239     private:
00240         Type m_real;
00241         Type m_imag;
00242     };
